org.elastos.hive

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elastos.hive.Result
      • org.elastos.hive.Client

  • public abstract class Client
extends Result
    Hive Client
    All other hive APIs should be called after having client instance.

    • Method Detail

      • createInstance

        public static <T> Client createInstance(Parameter<T> parameter)
                                 throws HiveException
        Create a new hive client instance to the specific backend.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Client type .
        Contains : `OneDriveClient`, `IPFSClient`, 'DropboxClient' and 'OwnCloudClient'
        Parameters:
        parameter - Set up the parameters required by the singleton client。

        Contains:`DropboxParameter`, `OwnCloudParameter`, 'IPFSParameter' and 'OneDriveParameter',
        For example: Use a OneDriveParameter will create OneDriveClient singleton

        Returns:
        Return a Hive Client singleton
        Throws:
        HiveException - An exception is thrown if an error occurs during createInstance

      • getInstance

        public static Client getInstance(DriveType driveType)
        Get a Hive Client sigleton based on the parameters passed in
        Parameters:
        driveType - DriveType paremeter

        There are several types：
        Returns:
        Return a HiveClient singleton
        See Also:


        localDrive("Local Drive"),
        oneDrive("OneDrive"),
        dropbox("Dropbox"),
        hiveIpfs("Hive IPFS"),
        ownCloud("ownCloud");

      • getDriveType

        public abstract DriveType getDriveType()
        Get current Hive Client driveType.
        Returns:
        Return current Hive Client driveType.

      • login

        public abstract void login(Authenticator authenticator)
                    throws HiveException
        Associate a user with the Client. During the process, the user delegates to the Client.

        This function is effective only when state of Client is "non logined state".

        Parameters:
        authenticator - Authenticator instance
        Throws:
        HiveException - An exception is thrown if an error occurs during login

      • logout

        public abstract void logout()
                     throws HiveException
        Dissociate the user from the Client. All client's data in persistent location is deleted. All derived instances of this client, such as drive and file instances would become invalid. And any calling APIs with invalid drive and file instance would be undefined.

        This function is effective only when state of Client is "logined".

        Throws:
        HiveException - An exception is thrown if an error occurs during logout

      • getLastInfo

        public abstract Client.Info getLastInfo()
        Get last Client.Info associated user's information.
        Returns:
        Return last Client.Info

      • getInfo

        public abstract java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<Client.Info> getInfo()
        Get Client.Info associated user's information. The result is filled into Client.Info.

        This function is effective only when state of Client is "logined".

        Returns:
        If no error occurs , return current Client.Info

      • getInfo

        public abstract java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<Client.Info> getInfo(Callback<Client.Info> callback)
        Get Client.Info associated user's information. The result is filled into Client.Info.
        This function is effective only when state of Client is "logined".

        Parameters:
        callback - callback user's information result
        Returns:
        If no error occurs , return current Client.Info

      • getDefaultDrive

        public abstract java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<Drive> getDefaultDrive()
        Get current Client's Drive,return current backend's Drive instance.
        Returns:
        If no error occurs , return current backend's Drive

      • getDefaultDrive

        public abstract java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<Drive> getDefaultDrive(Callback<Drive> callback)
        Get current Client's Drive,return current backend's Drive instance.
        Parameters:
        callback - callback getDefaultDrive result
        Returns:
        If no error occurs , return current backend's Drive
